content.text:
# 1870 Wollombi colonial by-election

A by-election was held for the New South Wales Legislative Assembly electorate of Wollombi on 19 September 1870 because Joseph Eckford was insolvent.
Dates
{| class="wikitable"
! Date !! Event
|-
| 8 July 1870
| Joseph Eckford declared insolvent.
|-
| 19 August 1870
| Joseph Eckford's seat of Wollombi was declared vacant.
|-
| 20 August 1870
| Writ of election issued by the Speaker of the Legislative Assembly.
|-
| 5 September 1870
| Nominations
|-
| 19 September 1870
| Polling day
|-
| 4 October 1870
| Return of writ
|}
Result
}}
Joseph Eckford was insolvent.

*Electoral results for the district of Wollombi
*List of New South Wales state by-elections
